name: San Francisco Rush 2049: Special Edition
overview:
San Francisco Rush 2049 Special Edition was produced by Midway Games in 2003.

A new version of San Francisco Rush 2049 with two new tracks and several new cars. Uses a phone number registration for Team Rush press "View 2" while choosing a track.

The special editon containes some new vehicles and race tracks that are also in the Dreamcast edition of Rush 2049.
